summary: Provides a collection of utility and test methods for vision‑text dual encoder models, handling configuration preparation, input generation, framework equivalence checks (PyTorch ↔ Flax), pretrained model validation, save/load integrity, and attention output verification.
business_intent: Enable developers to reliably build, validate, and maintain vision‑text dual encoder models across different deep‑learning frameworks, ensuring consistency, correctness, and easy model persistence.
